text: “Nɨ Aron ko an otariba sara inigh na bativamin Purirpenimɨn tiar akamɨn mangɨ. Egh ofa gamir gumazimɨn korotiaba ko ingangarir kam bagh me amɨsɨvamin olivɨn borem inigh. Egh arazir kuraba gɨn amangɨsɨ bulmakaun apurir tam ko sipsipɨn apurimning ko yis puvatɨzir bretɨn akɨrar izɨvazir tam, bizir kaba sara inigh God bativamin Purirpenimɨn mangɨ. Egh gumazamiziba bar men diaghtɨ, me Purirpenimɨn tiar akamɨn izɨ.”
